doc:
Derek Luke (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Derek_Luke_(actor) 0 Derek Luke (born April 24, 1974) is an American actor. He won the Independent Spirit Award for his big-screen debut performance in the 2002 film Antwone Fisher, directed and produced by Denzel Washington. Luke played Gabe Jones in Captain America: The First Avenger. Derek_Luke ( born April_24 , 1974 ) is an_American_actor . He won the_Independent_Spirit_Award for his_big-screen_debut_performance in the_2002_film_Antwone_Fisher , directed_and_produced by Denzel_Washington . Luke played Gabe_Jones in Captain_America : The_First_Avenger .
